subject: FROM: THE DESK OF:
body:
FROM: THE DESK OF:
MR.ROBERT GLEASON
REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT,
RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK,
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA(USA).
 ATTENTION:BENEFICIARY,
THIS IS TO INFORM YOU THAT YOUR OVER, DUE CONTRACT ENTLEMENT SUM OF USD30M WAS DISCUSSED,GAZETTED AND APPROVED FOR PAYMENT TO YOU AT THE G20 SUMMIT MEETING THAT WAS HELD IN INDIA ON THE 10TH OF SEPTEMBER 2023.
IT WAS FURTHER AGREED THAT DUE TO PROBLEMS IN AFRICA, THAT YOUR FUND CAN NOW BE TRANSFERRED TO YOU BY US.
WE STROBLY ASSURE YOU THAT WE MUST TRY OUR BEST TO SEE THAT YOUR FUND IS TRANSFERRED TO YOU.
ONCE AGAIN, 
DO FORWARD TO US YOUR FULL NAMES, ADDRESS, PHONE NUMBERS AS WE AS YOUR RECEIVING BANK ACCOUNT WHERE YOU WANT YOUR FUND BE TRANSFERRED INTO.
REGARDS AND GOD BLESS,
WAITING FOR YOUR ANSWER .
MR.ROBERT GLEASON
REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT,
RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK,
USA.

subject: Re: FROM: THE DESK OF:
body:
Hello Gleason,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding my overdue contract entitlement sum. It's interesting to hear that the payment was approved at a summit meeting in India.

However, before I proceed, I would like to know more about the problems in Africa that you mentioned. Could you please elaborate on what kind of problems are affecting the transfer of funds from Africa? Additionally, could you explain how the Reserve Bank of New York is involved in this process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK(VERY URGENT).
body:
FROM: THE DESK OF:
MR.ROBERT GLEASON
REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT,
RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK,
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA(USA).

 ATTENTION:SIR,

SERIES OF REPORTS CAME FROM FOREIGNERS WITH COMPLAINTS THAT THEY HAVE PAID
MONIES MANY TIMES AND HAVE NOT RECEIVED THEIR FUNDS AND THAT WAS WHY THE
UNITED NATIONS WITH WORLD BANK HAVE ORDERED THAT FUNDS NOW SHOULD BE PAID
TO BENEFICIARIES THROUGH FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK.

WE THEREFORE  FORWARD TO US YOUR FULL NAMES, ADDRESS, PHONE NUMBERS AS WE
AS YOUR RECEIVING BANK ACCOUNT WHERE YOU WANT YOUR FUND BE TRANSFERRED INTO.

REGARDS AND GOD BLESS,

MR.ROBERT GLEASON
REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT,
RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK,
USA.

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK(VERY URGENT).
body:
Hello Gleason,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the United Nations and World Bank ordering funds to be paid through the Federal Reserve Bank of New York. However, before I proceed, I have a few questions:

1. Can you please provide more details about the specific funds that are being referred to? What is the source of these funds?
2. How did you come across my contact information? Is there a specific reason why I was chosen for this opportunity?
3. Are there any fees or charges associated with this process? If so, could you please explain them in detail?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK.
body:
FROM: THE DESK OF:
MR.ROBERT GLEASON
REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT,
RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK,
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA(USA).

ATTENTION:SIR,

YOUR INHERITANCE FUND OF USD$15M

WE CAME IN CONTACT WITH YOU THROUGH YOUR INFORMATION THAT WAS SENT TO US BY
UNITED NATIONS TO CONTACT YOU AND SEE THAT YOU ARE PAID WITH YOUR
COMPLIANCE.

THE ONLY FEE IS YOUR TRANSACTION INFORMATION ACTIVATION FEE TO
UPDATE/ACTIVATE YOUR TRANSACTION FOR TRANSFER TO YOU THROUGH ANY OF YOUR
CHOICE.

REGARDS AND GOD BLESS,

MR.ROBERT GLEASON
REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT,
RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK,
USA.
USA.

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK.
body:
Hello Gleason,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding my fund. Could you please provide more details about the activation fee? What is it for and how much is required? Additionally, can you explain the process of updating and activating my account for the transfer?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK..
body:
Sir, thanks for your questions. Firstly, activation fee is a fee to update
your transaction to be active ready for transfer of funds to you and your
activation fee of your USD15M is USD800.00 only and as soon as that is
done, your fund will be activated and your fund will be received by you
through any means of your choice. I advise that you forward your full
address/phone number to us. Thank you, Mr Robert Gleason.

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK..
body:
Hello Mr. Robert Gleason, thank you for providing me with this information. I appreciate your response. Could you please clarify what the activation fee is specifically for? I just want to make sure I understand the process correctly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK....
body:
Sir, it is to make the transition legal and active for transfer. Regards,
Mr Robert Gleason.

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK....
body:
Hello Mr. Robert Gleason,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm curious about the transition you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about what exactly needs to be transferred and why it needs to be done legally? I want to make sure I understand the situation correctly.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK......
body:
Sir, done legally I meant is that it has to go with the ethics of financial
laws. Thanks, Robert Gleason

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK
body:
Sir, We advise that you urgently forward to us your full address, Phone
number and how you intend to have your fund, so that we can programme it
into our system ready for transfer by Cashier's Check, atm card or by bank
to bank transfer into your bank account. Waiting for your urgent response.
Thanks, Mr Robert Gleason (Director).

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK
body:
Hello Mr. Robert Gleason,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to assist me with the transfer of funds. However, before I provide any personal information, I would like to know more about the process and ensure that it is legitimate.

Could you please explain to me how this transfer works? What are the steps involved in getting the funds transferred by Cashier's Check, ATM card, or bank-to-bank transfer? Additionally, what are the fees or charges associated with each method?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK.
body:
Sir, thanks for your questions. The process of receiving funds are: by
Cashier's Check, you have to pay for your courier delivery to deliver it to
your place and same to atm card but for transfer of funds into your
account, you have to pay for the cost of transfer charges to enable your
fund be transferred into your bank account. Hope you understand. Thanks, Mr
Robert Gleason (Director).

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK.
body:
Hello Gleason,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding a remittance from the Reserve Bank of New York. Can you please provide me with more details about this fund? What is the purpose of this remittance and how did the United Nations get involved?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "activation fee"? I want to make sure I understand all the necessary steps before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK(URGENT)
body:
Sir, by atm card or cashier's check, you have to pay for your courier
delivery company services fee of USD800.00 and to cost of transfer also you
have to pay for your cost of transfer to enable the remittance department
transfer your fund into your account. Thank you, Mr Robert Gleason.

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK(URGENT)
body:
Hello Mr. Robert Gleason, thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the payment methods for the courier delivery company services fee and the cost of transfer. Can you please tell me more about how these fees are calculated? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding with any payments.

Best wishes,
Billye

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK(NOTICE)
body:
Sir, we have been advised/ordered by world bank/United Nations on that
amount only as a help to enable the beneficiaries have their funds without
any delay. Hope this is okay with you?. Thank you, Robert Gleason.

subject: Re: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK(NOTICE)
body:
Hello Robert Gleason,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in helping people access their funds without any delay. Can you please provide me with more information about the assistance being offered by the World Bank and the United Nations? I would like to understand how this process works and how it can benefit individuals.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Billye

body:

I'm also curious about the transfer of funds into my bank account. Could you explain how the cost of transfer charges is determined? Is it a fixed amount or does it vary depending on the amount being transferred?

Thank you once again for taking the time to answer my questions. I look forward to hearing from you.

subject: FROM: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK...
body:

Legally means to process it without any delay. Hopefully this is cleared
 Regards, Robert Gleason.
